szworkshop.verifyWorldChanges: Changing this game rule may cause irreversible changes to your world, such as entities and items disappearing permanently. Please enable the game rule 'szwUnderstand' to change this game rule.
gamerule.szwUnderstand: Allow SystemZee's Workshop features to be disabled, potentially making breaking changes to the world
gamerule.szwQuiver: Enable the Quiver and all related features
block.szworkshop.saw_mill.disabled: This block has been disabled by your server administrator. To use this block, enable the 'szwSawmill' game rule.
block.szworkshop.sifter.disabled: This block has been disabled by your server administrator. To use this block, enable the 'szwSifter' game rule.
